bad.alt: A Page from 'House Of Leaves'. This page is extremely difficult to navigate with backwards text and upsidedown text.
bad.description: This is a page from Mark Z Danielewski's House of Leaves. Users with vision impairments and users with screenreaders will find extremely difficult to navigate and read because of the way the text is organised.

good.alt: A screenshot of html code containing labels and alt tags for images
good.description: This html code uses alt tags for images and labels for buttons. These tags are made to be used with screenreaders allowing users with vision impairments to navigate and read the site.

hero.body: Health & Safety is an important implication to consider when creating your website. It's important to check to ensure that users are not going to be put in danger by your site.

bad.alt: Strobe Light Effects Flashing in the Users Face
bad.description: Unprompted Strobe Lights can negatively effect and harm users with epilepsy.

good.alt: A Flashing Light Warning, It Reads: 'WARNING, THE VIDEOS BELOW MAY CONTAIN BRIGHT FLASHING LIGHTS'
good.description: A warning gives users who may be affected a good indication of whats ahead. If they know they may be harmed they can click off to avoid it.
